name: Perspective Public Affairs

euInitiatives: 2030/2050 Climate Policy Frameworks; Emissions Trading System; Effort Sharing Regulation; LULUCF; Energy Efficiency Directive; Renewable Energy Directive; Industrial Emissions Directive; Ecodesign Directive; Bioeconomy; Circular Economy; Horizon 2020; Horizon Europe; Electricity market design; Plastic Strategy
